law.catch_line: Effect of "cancellation" or "rescission" on claims for antecedent breach.
law.text: Unless the contrary intention clearly appears, expressions of "cancellation" or "rescission" of the contract or the like shall not be construed as a renunciation or discharge of any claim in damages for an antecedent breach.
law.history: Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 2-720, effective July 1, 1960.
